dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: Haah... now let us converse for a moment.
Aeng-du seemed to have recovered somewhat as we fought. She bound Jun with a rope before throwing him to the ground.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Agh...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: I do not expect a mere Captain to know why your organization has put a bounty on our heads.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: But... I cannot quite place the reason you were standing guard before this room. It was as though you were protecting our mentor from us, of all people.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: Wait, it wasn't just you, was it? Every Kurokumo Clan filth we killed on our way up to this floor stood in our path like they were protecting something with their lives.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Fine. Here's the truth, then.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: ... We're the victims here.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: ...? Whatever do you mean?

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: You guys really have a way of pushing my buttons, huh...

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Haah... we weren't part of the party pursuing you or cutting you down. That was none of my business.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: You're just one of many, many Syndicates or organizations that were unlucky enough to be on the Thumb's shit list. Our run-in was just a coincidence.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: We were ordered by the Thumb to stand guard next to a black stele here, that's all.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Everyone was on edge because we were supposed to transport it elsewhere pretty soon...

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: ... and that's when you Blade Lineage bastards appeared out of nowhere.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: ... Out of nowhere?

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: I see... So this is where our mentor has awakened.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: You... Sounds like you know something that I don't...

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Can't say I've ever heard of a tech that could blip people into existence, just like that. Thought they were using a Singularity or something, tsk.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Besides... the Blade Lineage never had a chance.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Our numerical advantage was insurmountable.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: ... Of course.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: We had your friends cornered. We had no trouble cutting them down until there were but three of you left standing.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Then, all of a sudden, your boss' eye suddenly began to glow, and...

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Haah, he cut down everyone around him. It was a one-sided slaughter.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: What...? Then...

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: You got that right. Blade Lineage, Kurokumo Clan, it didn't matter. He cut through *everyone*.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: So what the hell was I supposed to do? What were we supposed to do? I'm their Captain—the lives of my men are my responsibility. I had to save them somehow.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: So I stayed behind to guard the door while my men guarded the entrance to this building. What other choice did I have?

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Haah... shit. Delivery deadline's coming up... I'm finished.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: This won't end with me having to cut off a finger or two... Dammit.

dataList.title: Kurokumo Clan Captain
dataList.content: Guh?!
Aeng-du struck the back of Jun's neck with a swift precision and dropped him to the floor.
Aeng-du?! That man had already been subdued! Wherefore didst thou—

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: I have merely put him to sleep. He would have caused us trouble had we attempted to enter that room while he was conscious.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: I... must talk to the mentor. See him with my own eyes.
Have you gone deaf, lass? Your boss'll cut down anyone who gets too close.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: No. That... cannot be.
Dante. We can infer from what information we have gathered that...
<Yeah, I agree... There's a powerful aura coming from behind that door. I can sense it.>

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: Our mentor...
Aeng-du's hands tremble as they wrap around the doorknob.
... We must prepare for battle.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: I know that mentor Bamboo-hatted Kim will do no such thing!
She slammed the door open...
... only to come face-to-face with a Distortion.
